desc: XRPL에서 확인된 모든 NFT 채굴자 목록을 확인할 수 있습니다. 프로젝트를 인정받고 싶으시다면, 웹 사이트 주소가 포함된 메모를 채굴한 트랜잭션에 추가하세요.
summary-period: XRPL had <1>{{minted}}</1> NFTs, from which <3>{{mintedAndBurned}}</3> NFTs {{percentMintedAndBurned}} were burned during the same period of time, total burned during this period: <7>{{burned}}</7> NFTs.
summary-all: XRPL had <1>{{minted}}</1> NFTs, from which <3>{{mintedAndBurned}}</3> NFTs {{percentMintedAndBurned}} were burned.
